abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Power Transmission Project
            will finance approximately 14 percent of the total
            investment by all beneficiaries in power transmission during
            the period 1972/73 to 1976/77. Equipment and materials to be
            financed out of the credit are as follows: (1) conductors
            and groundwire; (2) towers; (3) insulators; (4) substation
            equipment; (5) load dispatch equipment; and (6)
            miscellaneous equipment.
